recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado, mix with lemon and salt, spread and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Grill the chicken untill fully cooked. Chop the lettuce,tomato and cucumber. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and toss lightly.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Boil the pasta till al dente. Cook bacon until crisp. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Drain pasta, then quickly mix with egg mixture and bacon. Serve immediatley.
